Posts.Content: I also suffer with joint pain and do have arthritis. I have had breast cancer for 12 years.....took Arimidex for 4 years....that quit working and now I'm on Aromisin. I still have joint pain but I'm alive thanks to these drugs and have a great life!! I can live with the joint pain----if indeed it's even exacerbated by the meds.
Posts.Title: Arimidex, Femera, Aromisin Causing Autoimmune Disease
